info.title: Order service
info.description: This service is in charge of processing order events.

orderEventsChannel.description: All Order related events are distributed and broadcasted to the interested consumers.

onOrderConfirmation.description: The product availability of an order will lead to the confirmation of the order.
onOrderConfirmation.title: Order Confirmed

onOrderPlacement.description: The reception and validation of an order will lead to the placement of the order.
onOrderPlacement.title: Order Placed
